title: Cake
description: Watch and learn how to cut Cake using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery.

asset.title: Cake
asset.description: Watch and learn how to cut Cake using Calphalon Self-Sharpening Cutlery. For more videos, visit www.knifeskills.com
asset.author: Calphalon

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

If you've ever had difficulty getting quite a few slices out of a cake, I'm going to show you a method that's going to assist you. I'm going to use my six inch utility knife here and start by cutting a circle in the center of the cake. Pull the core out of the center. And you can simply go around the cake slicing as thin or as thickly as you like depending on how many guests you have. When you have children, then you just want to give them smaller sizes or you can cut larger slices. This is going to give you a significant larger number of slices than you would with your regular diagonal cuts which may only produce eight to ten.
